extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed CODESYS Development System Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the CODESYS Development System to determine if it is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version of CODESYS Development System between 3.5.11.0 and 3.5.19.19?
Which method to update CODESYS Development System?

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Installer
extracted_playbook.description: Use the CODESYS Installer to download and install the update to version 3.5.19.20.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Store
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the update to version 3.5.19.20 from the CODESYS Store.

extracted_playbook.title: Update CODESYS Development System via CODESYS Update Area
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the instructions in the CODESYS Update area to obtain and install the update to version 3.5.19.20.
